scripts.build: cd packages/tui && bun run build && cd ../ai && bun run build && cd ../agent && bun run build && cd ../coding-agent && bun run build && cd ../mom && bun run build && cd ../web-ui && bun run build && cd ../pods && bun run build
scripts.dev: concurrently --names "ai,agent,coding-agent,mom,web-ui,tui" --prefix-colors "cyan,yellow,red,white,green,magenta" "cd packages/ai && bun run dev" "cd packages/agent && bun run dev" "cd packages/coding-agent && bun run dev" "cd packages/mom && bun run dev" "cd packages/web-ui && bun run dev" "cd packages/tui && bun run dev"
scripts.dev:tsc: concurrently --names "ai,web-ui" --prefix-colors "cyan,green" "cd packages/ai && bun run dev:tsc" "cd packages/web-ui && bun run dev:tsc"
scripts.check: biome check --write --error-on-warnings . && tsgo --noEmit && cd packages/web-ui && bun run check
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run clean && bun run build && bun run check
scripts.publish: bun run prepublishOnly && npm publish -ws --access public
scripts.publish:dry: bun run prepublishOnly && npm publish -ws --access public --dry-run
